description:
A whole new perspective on paddling. The window in the bottom of the cockpit is fun during the day, and extra-trippy at night if you paddle near areas with bioluminescent species. When you're done studying aquatic life, the Intrigue's ultralight hull makes it easy to stow on your dock or roof rack.

  • New thermoformed ABS construction is almost 4kg lighter than previous versions
  • Window is made of clear polycarbonate
  • Recessed deck fittings reduce hang-ups
  • Built-in keel-like bow and stern helps the Intrigue track well
  • Wide hull and hard chines provide excellent stability
  • Rear hatch and bulkhead provide safety and dry storage
  • Outfitted with grab handles, bungees, flotation in the bow, watertight stern storage, locking foot pedals, moulded seat with adjustable backrest, recessed fittings, drainage slots on the deck, and a paddle-shaft holder to assist with entries and exits
name: Riot Kayaks Intrigue Ultralight Kayak with Window
